meta.title: Subsumio – Intelligent Legal Document Platform
meta.description: The AI-powered platform that transforms how law firms manage documents, deadlines, and cases. Automate analysis, reduce errors, and win more cases.
meta.keywords: legal tech, AI lawyer, document management, law firm software, case management, legal AI, contract analysis

docs.pageSubtitle: Guides and reference material to get the most out of Subsumio.

featureDetail.step2: Subsumio extracts structure and meaning with OCR + semantic chunking.
featureDetail.step3: Search, cross-reference, and cite sources with auditability.
featureDetail.faq1Q: Is this compliant for legal workflows?
featureDetail.faq1A: Subsumio is built for auditability and traceability, with clear source references and structured workflows.
featureDetail.faq2Q: Does it work with scanned PDFs?
featureDetail.faq2A: Yes. Scanned documents can be processed via OCR and ingested into a searchable semantic index.
featureDetail.faq3Q: How quickly can my team onboard?
featureDetail.faq3A: Most teams are productive within hours. The docs cover best practices and the recommended workflow.
featureDetail.collectiveLead: Collective Intelligence turns every matter into a firm asset: Subsumio detects repeatable patterns, building blocks, and risk signals — and brings them back instantly when a similar case appears. Your firm gets faster, more consistent, and safer with every document.
featureDetail.collectiveHowTitle: How the legal AI brain keeps improving
featureDetail.collectiveStep1: Cases are processed: structure, events, argument lines, and legal references are transformed into semantic patterns.
featureDetail.collectiveStep2: Your firm's know-how becomes reusable assets: building blocks, checklists, playbooks, and early warning signals — with sources and versioning.
featureDetail.collectiveStep3: The copilot applies those assets inside active matters: better prioritization, consistent drafting, and fewer blind spots — without reinventing work every time.
featureDetail.collectiveBenefitsTitle: Practical impact in daily legal work
featureDetail.collectiveBenefitsSubtitle: Not abstract AI promises, but real matter-level improvements from first upload to final brief.
featureDetail.collectiveBenefit1Desc: Recurring signals in deadlines, evidence chains, and argument structure become visible earlier, before risk escalates.
featureDetail.collectiveBenefit2Desc: The more your team works with Subsumio, the sharper prioritization, suggestions, and building blocks become — aligned with your firm's standards and proven playbooks.
featureDetail.collectiveBenefit3Title: Faster path from analysis to action
featureDetail.collectiveBenefit3Desc: Less search and coordination overhead, more focus on legal strategy, client communication, and time-critical decisions.
featureDetail.collectiveTrustDesc: The system learns from abstracted signals instead of client-identifiable raw documents. Access controls, auditability, and EU hosting remain enterprise-grade.
featureDetail.collectiveMechanicsTitle: From work to firm knowledge: the mechanics
featureDetail.collectiveMechanicsSubtitle: Collective Intelligence is not a chat feature. It's a knowledge layer that turns real matters into reusable, reviewable assets — and serves them at the right moment.
featureDetail.collectiveMechanic1Desc: Subsumio extracts entities, deadlines, argument lines, legal references, and citations — then links them across documents into one coherent case picture.
featureDetail.collectiveMechanic2Desc: Signals become building blocks, checklists, and playbooks. Outputs stay tied to evidence and citations so your team can review and audit them.
featureDetail.collectiveMechanic3Desc: When a similar matter shows up, the copilot suggests what has worked inside your firm — not generic internet answers.
featureDetail.collectiveMechanic4Desc: Assumptions can be confirmed, corrected, and versioned. Over time, the system becomes more precise for your firm — without requiring new hires to know everything.
featureDetail.collectiveMechanicsNoteDesc: You decide what becomes a firm asset: optionally via review/approval. Everything stays role-based, auditable, and client-separated.
featureDetail.collectiveCourtroomSubtitle: Optimize structure, tone, and argument order based on court-specific patterns from public decisions and your own briefs — without personal profiles.
featureDetail.collectiveCourtroom1Desc: See which evidence styles, structures, and argument paths tend to be persuasive in a given jurisdiction or court — grounded in sources.
featureDetail.collectiveCourtroom2Title: Offense & defense briefs in the right style
featureDetail.collectiveCourtroom2Desc: The copilot suggests phrasing, reasoning order, and citation style that match the relevant legal framework — with source grounding.
featureDetail.collectiveCourtroom3Desc: Subsumio detects common objections, evidence attack points, and argumentative patterns from the opposing side — and helps you optimize offense and defense briefs accordingly (with source grounding).
featureDetail.collectiveCourtroomGuardrailsDesc: No personal judge/prosecutor profiles and no outcome promises. Focus on verifiable legal patterns and formal requirements — GDPR-oriented, auditable, and controlled.
featureDetail.collectiveOutputsSubtitle: The goal isn't “more text”. It's better decisions and faster execution — with clear, reusable outputs.
featureDetail.collectiveOutputsWhyLabel: Why this creates a firm advantage
featureDetail.collectiveOutput1Example: “Objection: lack of causation → response: proven reasoning + relevant case law + drafting block grounded in your matter sources.”
featureDetail.collectiveOutput1Why: Your team reuses vetted building blocks instead of rewriting from scratch — faster, consistent, and with fewer contradictions.
featureDetail.collectiveOutput2Example: “Warning: deadline calculation depends on proof of service — document missing. Suggested action: request + task for case file.”
featureDetail.collectiveOutput2Why: You detect gaps early — before they become costly. This reduces malpractice risk and last-minute pressure.
featureDetail.collectiveOutput3Title: Opponent intelligence: optimized offense & defense briefs
featureDetail.collectiveOutput3Example: “Typical opposing tactic in similar matters: objection A → firm-tested response B + source anchors + recommended argument order + drafting block (auditable).”
featureDetail.collectiveOutput3Why: You don't just draft “a brief” — you draft the right brief against predictable objections, faster and with fewer surprises. No personal profiling: patterns over people.
featureDetail.collectiveOutput4Example: “Checklist: red lines, anchors, typical concessions, documented reasoning for client communication.”
featureDetail.collectiveOutput4Why: Negotiation know-how scales across the team while preserving consistent strategy and tone.
featureDetail.collectiveOutput5Example: “Suggested phrasing in your firm's style incl. preferred structure, citation style, and standard disclaimers.”
featureDetail.collectiveOutput5Why: New team members reach partner-level quality faster because structure and style are systemized.
featureDetail.collectiveWalkthroughTitle: One matter in 6 minutes: how firm intelligence is built
featureDetail.collectiveWalkthroughSubtitle: How documents become a reusable edge — without outsourcing your legal thinking.
featureDetail.collectiveWalkthrough1Desc: Drop in PDFs, scans, emails, and images. Subsumio structures the file, detects document types, and builds a semantic index.
featureDetail.collectiveWalkthrough2Desc: Deadlines, parties, amounts, file references, and citations are extracted and linked to source locations.
featureDetail.collectiveWalkthrough3Desc: The copilot suggests risk checks, argument lines, and next steps — inside the matter context.
featureDetail.collectiveWalkthrough4Desc: Building blocks can be confirmed, edited, and promoted to firm assets. This is where knowledge truly scales.
featureDetail.collectiveWalkthrough5Desc: Next similar matter starts with momentum: Subsumio serves relevant blocks, checklists, and risk signals automatically.
featureDetail.collectiveWalkthroughBeforeText: Know-how lives in individual heads. Briefs are rebuilt. Risks are found late.
featureDetail.collectiveWalkthroughAfterText: Know-how becomes a system: reviewable assets, consistent quality, and faster work — matter by matter.
featureDetail.collectiveDiffTitle: Why other AI can't deliver this
featureDetail.collectiveDiffSubtitle: Chatbots answer. Collective Intelligence builds firm value: assets, governance, and reuse — grounded in sources.
featureDetail.collectiveDiff1: Cumulative, not stateless: learn and reuse across matters.
featureDetail.collectiveDiff2: Assets, not chat: blocks, checklists, playbooks — not just text.
featureDetail.collectiveDiff3: Source grounding: outputs stay tied to evidence and citations (auditable).
featureDetail.collectiveDiff4: Governance: roles, approvals, and audit trails so firm knowledge grows with control.
featureDetail.collectiveGovernanceDesc: You decide what qualifies as a firm asset and who can use it. Optional review before promotion for maximum quality and compliance.
featureDetail.collectiveFaq1Q: Does the system train on our original documents?
featureDetail.collectiveFaq1A: Learning is based on anonymized, abstracted patterns. Raw case files are not exchanged across firms.
featureDetail.collectiveFaq2Q: What concrete effect will lawyers notice day-to-day?
featureDetail.collectiveFaq2A: Faster orientation in complex matters, better prioritization of next steps, and more robust suggestions for drafting and legal strategy.
featureDetail.collectiveFaq3Q: How does this align with privacy and compliance?
featureDetail.collectiveFaq3A: Anonymization, role-based access, audit trails, and EU hosting keep operations GDPR-oriented and verifiable for law-firm compliance.

hero.title: The Future of
hero.subtitle: Subsumio transforms how law firms manage documents, deadlines, and cases. Powered by AI that understands legal context — so your team can focus on winning cases, not paperwork.
hero.ctaNote: 14-day reverse trial · 14-day money-back guarantee · No credit card required

socialProof.trustedBy: Trusted by leading law firms and legal departments

problem.label: The Problem
problem.title: Legal Work Shouldn't Feel Like This
problem.subtitle: Law firms waste thousands of hours and millions in revenue on problems that technology should have solved long ago.
problem.pain1Desc: 42% of malpractice claims stem from missed deadlines. Manual calendar tracking is a ticking time bomb for your firm.
problem.pain2Desc: Lawyers spend 2.3 hours daily searching for documents. That's 575 billable hours per year lost to inefficient document management.
problem.pain3Desc: Manual contract review misses contradictions 23% of the time. One oversight can cost your client — and your reputation — dearly.

solution.label: The Solution
solution.title: One Platform. Total Control.
solution.subtitle: Subsumio replaces scattered tools with one intelligent platform that handles everything from document intake to case strategy.
solution.card1Desc: Our AI reads, understands, and analyzes legal documents in seconds — detecting contradictions, extracting key clauses, and suggesting relevant case law.
solution.card2Desc: Automated deadline tracking with intelligent reminders. Calculate procedural deadlines from 50+ legal frameworks across jurisdictions automatically.
solution.card3Desc: From document intake through OCR to final brief generation — every step of your case workflow, powered by AI and fully auditable.

features.label: Features
features.title: Everything Your Firm Needs
features.subtitle: A comprehensive suite of tools designed specifically for legal professionals, from solo practitioners to large firms.
features.feature1Desc: From upload to semantic structure: Subsumio processes scans, PDFs, and contracts in a synchronized OCR+AI pipeline, extracts entities with high fidelity, and makes every section instantly searchable.
features.feature2Desc: AI-powered cross-reference analysis finds contradictions between witness statements, contracts, and evidence. Never miss a critical inconsistency again.
features.feature3Desc: Intelligent deadline calculation for 50+ legal frameworks (ZPO, AVG, ABGB, StPO). Automatic reminders with escalation chains and team notifications.
features.feature4Desc: Search through OGH, BGH, and ECHR case law with semantic AI search. Get relevant precedents suggested automatically based on your case facts.
features.feature5Desc: Generate briefs, motions, and legal letters from 13+ templates. Auto-populate with case data, party information, and proper legal citations.
features.feature6Desc: Track all evidence with strength ratings, categorization, and gap analysis. Know exactly what you have and what you still need to prove your case.
features.feature7Desc: Full support for Austrian, German, and EU law. Legal norms database with 50+ statutes including ABGB, BGB, StGB, MRG, InsO, and EMRK articles.
features.feature8Desc: Complete client, matter, and team management. Assign lawyers to cases, track billing, generate case numbers, and maintain a full audit trail.
features.pageTitle: Powerful Features for Modern Law Firms
features.pageSubtitle: More than a database: Subsumio builds a semantic case knowledge base so AI can understand context, detect risk, and ground results in sources — instead of relying on keyword guessing.
features.comparisonSubtitle: See why leading firms are switching to Subsumio
features.feature9Desc: Every case makes the platform smarter. Semantic patterns from real matters accelerate cross-references, norm application, and argument structures — so new cases are handled faster and with fewer blind spots. Learning is anonymized and aggregated; raw documents are not shared across firms.

howItWorks.label: How It Works
howItWorks.title: Up and Running in Minutes
howItWorks.subtitle: Getting started with Subsumio is simple. No complex setup, no lengthy training — just upload and let AI do the heavy lifting.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Drag and drop your case files — PDFs, scans, images, contracts. Our pipeline processes everything automatically.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Subsumio extracts text, identifies entities, detects contradictions, and maps relevant legal norms in seconds.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Get a comprehensive case dashboard with findings, deadlines, evidence gaps, and AI-suggested case strategies.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Create briefs, manage deadlines, and build your case — all from one platform with full audit trail.

ai.label: AI-Powered
ai.title: Legal AI That Actually Understands Law
ai.subtitle: Not just another chatbot. Subsumio is trained on legal context, understands procedural rules, and delivers actionable insights — not generic summaries.
ai.capability1Desc: Understands legal documents at a semantic level — not just keywords, but meaning, context, and legal implications.
ai.capability2Desc: Automatically cross-references statements, clauses, and evidence across your entire case file to find contradictions and connections.
ai.capability3Desc: Knows the difference between Austrian, German, and EU law. Applies the correct legal framework to every analysis.
ai.capability4Desc: Every AI finding comes with proper legal citations, ready to be inserted into your briefs and motions.

security.label: Security & Compliance
security.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
security.subtitle: Your clients trust you with their most sensitive information. We protect it with the highest security standards in the industry.
security.feature1Desc: Full compliance with EU General Data Protection Regulation. Data processing agreements included for all plans.
security.feature2Desc: All data encrypted at rest (AES-256) and in transit (TLS 1.3). Zero-knowledge architecture means we can never access your data.
security.feature3Desc: All data stored exclusively in EU data centers. No data leaves the European Union — guaranteed by contract.
security.feature4Desc: Independently audited security controls. Annual penetration testing and continuous monitoring by certified security experts.
security.feature5Desc: Granular permission system with role-based access control. Define exactly who can see, edit, and export which data.
security.feature6Desc: Cryptographically chained audit logs with hash verification. Every action is recorded and tamper-proof for compliance.
security.pageSubtitle: Built from the ground up with security-first architecture to protect your clients' most sensitive information.
security.architectureDesc: Our multi-layered security architecture ensures your data is protected at every level — from network to application to storage.
security.ctaDesc: Request our security factsheet with technical details on architecture, encryption, compliance, and data handling.

testimonials.label: Testimonials
testimonials.title: Trusted by Legal Professionals
testimonials.subtitle: Lawyers who've transformed their practice with Subsumio.
testimonials.quote2: From 3 hours per case to automated.
testimonials.quote4: Big firm capabilities for a solo practitioner.
testimonials.quote5: The security and GDPR compliance was the deciding factor. Our clients demand the highest data protection standards, and Subsumio delivers.
testimonials.quote6: Implementation took less than a day. The ROI was visible within the first week — fewer errors, faster turnaround, happier clients.

pricing.title: One AI Agent. The output of a 10-person team.
pricing.subtitle: Subsumio analyzes 10,000 pages in under 5 minutes — work that would otherwise take weeks. Choose the plan that fits your firm.

pricing.kanzleiDesc: The complete AI legal suite for small to mid-size firms. Full analysis power, multi-jurisdiction, team collaboration.
pricing.kanzleiFeature14: Collective Intelligence: team assets + opponent patterns + courtroom intelligence (no profiling)

pricing.businessValueProp: Delivers workload relief equivalent to 10+ team members

pricing.enterpriseFeature4: Custom AI models fine-tuned to your practice

pricing.comparisonSubtitle: Every feature, every plan — complete transparency.
pricing.addonsSubtitle: Need more? Scale individual capabilities without changing your plan.
pricing.addon1Desc: Add 5,000 additional pages of AI analysis capacity to any plan.
pricing.addon2Desc: Add 10 additional user seats to your current plan.
pricing.addon3Desc: Round-the-clock phone support with a guaranteed 1-hour response time.
pricing.addon4Desc: We build custom document templates tailored to your firm's specific needs.
pricing.addon5Desc: White-glove migration from your existing systems with hands-on training for your entire team.
pricing.addon6Desc: Isolated compute and storage resources for maximum performance and data isolation.
pricing.trustTitle: Trusted by 500+ Law Firms Across Europe
pricing.faq1Q: Can I switch plans at any time?
pricing.faq1A: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time. When upgrading, you get immediate access to all new features. When downgrading, changes take effect at the end of your billing cycle. We always prorate charges fairly.
pricing.faq2Q: What happens after the 14-day free trial?
pricing.faq2A: After your trial, choose a paid plan to keep full access. If you don't subscribe, your account shifts to a limited free workspace so you can continue and upgrade when needed — no data is deleted.
pricing.faq3Q: How does the pages/month limit work?
pricing.faq3A: Each page of a document counts as one page toward your monthly limit. Multi-page PDFs count each page individually. Unused pages don't roll over, but you can always purchase add-on page packs if you need a burst of extra capacity.
pricing.faq4A: Each person who logs into Subsumio needs their own user seat. Seats can be reassigned at any time — if someone leaves, simply transfer their seat to a new team member at no additional cost.
pricing.faq5Q: Do you offer discounts for non-profits or legal aid?
pricing.faq5A: Yes! We offer 50% off all plans for non-profit legal organizations, legal aid clinics, and pro-bono practices. Contact our sales team with proof of non-profit status to get started.
pricing.faq6Q: Is there a setup fee or long-term contract?
pricing.faq6A: No setup fees and no long-term commitments. All plans are month-to-month (or annual with 20% savings). You can cancel at any time — we believe in earning your business every month.
pricing.faq7Q: Can I try the full platform before committing?
pricing.faq7A: Absolutely. Every plan starts with a 14-day reverse trial: full premium access first, then a guided transition to a limited free workspace unless you upgrade. No credit card required to start.
pricing.faq8Q: How secure is my data? Can I self-host?
pricing.faq8A: All data is encrypted end-to-end (AES-256 at rest, TLS 1.3 in transit) and stored exclusively in EU data centers. Our zero-knowledge architecture means we can never access your documents. Enterprise plans include a full self-hosted option for maximum data sovereignty.
pricing.pageTitle: Invest in AI that gives your legal team real leverage
pricing.pageSubtitle: Analyze 10,000 pages in 5 minutes. Detect contradictions in seconds. Keep every deadline under control. Start your 14-day reverse trial now.
pricing.addon7Desc: Add 5M additional AI Credits per month to any plan.
pricing.addon8Desc: Add 20M additional AI Credits per month to any plan. Best for high-volume teams.
pricing.creditsTooltip: AI Credits are token-based usage for analysis & generation (input + output). Buy more anytime via add-ons.
pricing.faq9Q: What are AI Credits (tokens) and how are they counted?
pricing.faq9A: AI Credits measure token-based usage (input + output) for AI analysis and document generation. Longer documents and longer responses use more credits. We show your usage transparently in-app so you always stay in control.
pricing.faq10Q: What happens if we run out of AI Credits?
pricing.faq10A: Nothing breaks. You can purchase AI Credit packs instantly as add-ons, or upgrade your plan. We also notify you early when you're approaching your monthly limit so there are no surprises.

pricing.stickyFaq1Q: Can I cancel at any time?
pricing.stickyFaq1A: Yes. Monthly plans can be canceled at any time. For annual plans, access remains active until the end of the billing period.
pricing.stickyFaq2Q: Is data stored in a GDPR-compliant way?
pricing.stickyFaq2A: Yes. Subsumio follows GDPR-compliant standards with tamper-resistant logging for legal workflows.
pricing.stickyFaq3Q: How fast can I get started?

integration.title: Integrates With Your Workflow
integration.subtitle: Subsumio works seamlessly with the tools your firm already uses.

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Subsumio. Can't find your answer? Contact our team.
faq.q1: What types of documents can Subsumio process?
faq.a1: Subsumio processes virtually any document type — PDFs, scanned images, Word documents, emails, and more. Our advanced OCR pipeline can even handle low-quality scans and handwritten notes with high accuracy.
faq.q2: Is my data safe with Subsumio?
faq.a2: Absolutely. We use end-to-end encryption (AES-256 at rest, TLS 1.3 in transit), EU-only data centers, and zero-knowledge architecture. We're GDPR compliant, SOC 2 Type II certified, and undergo annual security audits.
faq.a3: We currently support Austrian law (ABGB, ZPO, StGB, MRG, and more), German law (BGB, StPO, InsO, HGB), and EU law (EMRK articles). We're continuously expanding our legal knowledge base.
faq.a4: Yes! Our Enterprise plan includes a self-hosted option that runs entirely within your own infrastructure. Perfect for firms with strict data sovereignty requirements.
faq.q5: How accurate is the AI analysis?
faq.a5: Our AI achieves a 99.7% accuracy rate in document analysis and entity extraction. Contradiction detection has been validated against expert human review with 96% agreement.
faq.a6: Most firms are up and running within a day. Simply create your account, configure your firm settings, and start uploading documents. No complex IT setup required.
faq.q7: Do you offer training for our team?
faq.a7: Yes, all plans include access to our comprehensive documentation and video tutorials. Professional plans include priority support, and Enterprise plans include on-site training sessions.
faq.q8: Can I export my data at any time?
faq.a8: Absolutely. You own your data. Export everything at any time in standard formats (JSON, CSV, PDF). No lock-in, no hidden fees for data export.
faq.q9: What languages does the interface support?
faq.a9: Subsumio is available in 9 languages: English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, and Arabic. Legal content analysis supports German and Austrian legal terminology.
faq.a10: Yes, our Professional and Enterprise plans include full API access with comprehensive documentation. Integrate Subsumio's capabilities directly into your existing systems.

footer.description: The AI-powered platform for legal documents trusted by 500+ law firms worldwide.
footer.newsletterDesc: Get the latest updates on features, legal tech insights, and product news.

about.pageSubtitle: We're on a mission to make legal work smarter, faster, and more accessible for every law firm.
about.missionDesc: Legal professionals deserve better tools. Too many brilliant lawyers waste their talent on repetitive administrative tasks — searching through documents, calculating deadlines, and copying data between systems. We believe AI can handle the tedious work so lawyers can focus on what they do best: advocating for their clients.
about.storyDesc: Subsumio was born in Vienna in 2024, when our founding team — a mix of software engineers, legal professionals, and AI researchers — experienced firsthand the frustrating inefficiencies in legal practice. We set out to build the platform we wished existed: intelligent, secure, and built specifically for law.
about.value1Desc: Attorney-client privilege is sacred. We build every feature with security and privacy as the foundation, not an afterthought.
about.value2Desc: We don't just build technology — we build legal technology. Every feature is informed by practicing attorneys and legal scholars.
about.value3Desc: No black boxes. Our AI explains its reasoning, cites its sources, and gives you full control over every decision.
about.value4Desc: Law evolves, and so do we. We continuously expand our legal knowledge base and improve our AI models with the latest research.
about.milestone1Desc: Subsumio founded by a team of engineers, lawyers, and AI researchers.
about.milestone2Desc: First beta with 50 law firms testing document analysis and deadline management.
about.milestone3Desc: Official launch with AI analysis, contradiction detection, and case law research.
about.milestone4Desc: Reached 500+ law firms across Austria, Germany, and Switzerland.
about.milestone5Desc: Launched in 9 languages with EU, US, and APAC market presence.
about.ctaDesc: Experience how Subsumio elevates your document analysis, deadline management, and case strategy — free for 14 days.

contact.pageSubtitle: Have questions about Subsumio? Want to schedule a demo? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help...
contact.submitSuccess: Thank you! We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

legalPrivacy.intro: At RCIID ("Subsumio"), we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform.
legalPrivacy.section1Content: We collect information you provide directly, such as your name, email address, company information, and payment details when you create an account. We also collect usage data, device information, and log data automatically to improve our services.
legalPrivacy.section2Content: We use your information to provide and maintain our services, process transactions, send communications, improve our platform, ensure security, and comply with legal obligations.
legalPrivacy.section3Content: All data is stored exclusively in EU data centers (Frankfurt, Germany). We use AES-256 encryption at rest and TLS 1.3 in transit. Our zero-knowledge architecture ensures we cannot access your document contents.
legalPrivacy.section4Content: We do not sell your personal data. We only share information with service providers who assist in operating our platform, and only under strict data processing agreements.
legalPrivacy.section5Content: Under GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, erase, restrict processing, data portability, and object to processing of your personal data. Contact our DPO at privacy@subsumio.ai.
legalPrivacy.section6Content: We use essential cookies for platform functionality and optional analytics cookies (only with your consent). You can manage cookie preferences at any time through our cookie banner.
legalPrivacy.section7Content: We retain your data for as long as your account is active. Upon account deletion, all personal data is permanently deleted within 30 days. Document data is deleted immediately.
legalPrivacy.section8Content: For privacy inquiries, contact our Data Protection Officer at privacy@subsumio.ai or write to RCIID, Kärntner Straße 1, 1010 Vienna, Austria.

legalTerms.intro: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of Subsumio, operated by RCIID. By using our platform, you agree to these Terms.
legalTerms.section1Content: Subsumio provides AI-powered legal document management, analysis, and workflow tools. The service is designed as a professional tool to assist legal professionals — it does not constitute legal advice.
legalTerms.section2Content: You must provide accurate information when creating an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your credentials and for all activities under your account.
legalTerms.section3Content: You agree to use Subsumio only for lawful purposes and in accordance with applicable professional conduct rules. You may not use the service to violate any laws or regulations.
legalTerms.section4Content: You retain all rights to your documents and data. We retain rights to the Subsumio platform, software, and AI models. Our service does not claim ownership of any content you upload.
legalTerms.section5Content: Paid plans are billed in advance on a monthly or annual basis. Prices are in EUR and do not include applicable taxes. You may cancel at any time; service continues until the end of the billing period.
legalTerms.section6Content: We guarantee 99.9% uptime for Professional and Enterprise plans. Scheduled maintenance windows are announced 48 hours in advance. Credits are issued for SLA violations.
legalTerms.section7Content: Subsumio is provided as a tool to assist legal professionals. We are not liable for legal outcomes based on the use of our platform. AI-generated insights should always be reviewed by qualified professionals.
legalTerms.section8Content: These Terms are governed by Austrian law. Any disputes shall be resolved by the competent courts of Vienna, Austria.

legalImprint.companyName: RCIID - Rocket Chain Investigation & Intelligence Divison
legalImprint.disputeText: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (OS): https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr. We are neither obligated nor willing to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.

collectiveIntelligence.label: Collective Intelligence
collectiveIntelligence.title: The Legal Brain That Never Stops Learning
collectiveIntelligence.subtitle: Every case analyzed on Subsumio makes the entire network smarter. Anonymized insights from 500+ law firms create a shared legal brain — the most powerful competitive advantage in modern legal practice.
collectiveIntelligence.howSubtitle: Your cases contribute anonymized legal patterns to the network. In return, you get access to the collective wisdom of the entire legal community.
collectiveIntelligence.how1Desc: Every insight is stripped of names, dates, case numbers, and personal data before entering the shared pool. Military-grade anonymization ensures absolute confidentiality.
collectiveIntelligence.how2Desc: AI identifies successful strategies, norm application patterns, and court tendencies across thousands of anonymized cases — patterns no single firm could discover alone.
collectiveIntelligence.how3Desc: Knowledge entries are validated by multiple independent sources. The more firms confirm a pattern, the higher its confidence score — ensuring only proven insights reach you.
collectiveIntelligence.how4Desc: When you analyze a case or chat with the AI, relevant collective knowledge is automatically injected — giving you the strategic depth of 500+ firms in every conversation.
collectiveIntelligence.benefitsSubtitle: While competitors rely on individual experience, you leverage the collective intelligence of the entire legal network.
collectiveIntelligence.benefit1Desc: Access battle-tested legal strategies validated across hundreds of similar cases. Know what works before you step into the courtroom.
collectiveIntelligence.benefit2Desc: See how specific paragraphs have been applied across the network. Understand court tendencies and success rates for every legal argument.
collectiveIntelligence.benefit3Desc: A continuously growing database of court decisions contributed by the entire network. OGH, BGH, and ECHR decisions with relevance scoring and citation tracking.
collectiveIntelligence.benefit4Desc: The AI identifies areas where your case analysis might be missing critical insights — and fills the gaps with collective knowledge.
collectiveIntelligence.benefit5Desc: Spot emerging legal trends before they become mainstream. See which arguments are gaining traction and which court tendencies are shifting.
collectiveIntelligence.benefit6Desc: Admin users get a command center showing the full collective intelligence — trending topics, norm heatmaps, proven strategies, and knowledge gaps across the network.
collectiveIntelligence.privacyDesc: Knowledge sharing is opt-in, anonymized, and GDPR-compliant. Your documents stay in your firm environment — only abstracted patterns (not raw documents) enter the shared pool.
collectiveIntelligence.complianceNoteDesc: You control what gets shared. The shared pool contains no client data and no raw documents — only anonymized, aggregated legal patterns.
collectiveIntelligence.ctaDesc: Be part of the most powerful legal knowledge network in Europe. Every case you analyze makes you — and every firm on the network — smarter.
